verbs.description: [ARG1: The MRC ’s Tim Graham] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on C - SPAN ’s Washington Journal] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] and slammed the smug CNN for its claim to a hold on truth . Host Bill Scanlan read from S.E. Cupp ’s op - ed ripping into Sean Hannity for failing to disclose a relationship with Donald Trump ’s lawyer , Michael Cohen .
